# CHARONETTE Cruiser Railgun
A [color=gold]ballistic[/color] compact railgun based off the CHARON that fires a large slug at rapid velocity, capable of big damage to enemy ships. Medium linear accelerator, can be remotely activated or linked up to a GCS.
## Gun Specifications
- Firerate: [color=crimson]3 RPM[/color] ([color=deepskyblue]0.05 RPS[/color]) - Sell Value: [color=greenyellow][bold]25000 Spesos[/bold][/color] - Muzzle Velocity: [color=orange]400 m/s[/color] - Range: [color=orange]1280m[/color] - Power Usage (Passive): [color=turquoise]600/s[/color] - Capacitor Storage: [color=orange]40000u[/color] - Capacitor Recharge: [color=turquoise]150/s[/color] - Capacitor Fire Cost: [color=turquoise]1000u[/color] - Firing Mode: [color=gold]Single Shot[/color]
